Changelog
=========


1.0.2 (2017-03-10)
------------------

- Fix parse and replace issues.

  - Parentheses should not be included in the phone links.
  - Trailing text should not be ignored.

  [Kevin Bieri]


1.0.1 (2017-01-13)
------------------

- Fix error in treeWalker on Internet Explorer >= 9.
  [Kevin Bieri]


1.0.0 (2016-11-30)
------------------

- Initial implementation
